this method is used to add Country.
addCountry(Country) - 类 中的方法Model.Player
When a player conquers a country the country needs to be added to a data structure that keeps track of all the countries the player occupies.
addCountry(ArrayList<Country>) - 类 中的方法Model.Player
Works like addCountry above, but can be used to add multiple countries at once.
